name: Bangladesh Investment Summit 2025
shortDescription: Bangladesh Investment Summit 2025 brings together entrepreneurs, venture capitalists, and policymakers to explore the nation's growing potential in sectors like AI, fintech, and clean energy. With panel discussions, startup showcases, and investor networking sessions, the summit acts as a launchpad for innovation and economic collaboration in Bangladesh.

name: Chittagong Street Art Festival
shortDescription: The Chittagong Street Art Festival is a bold celebration of urban creativity. Witness the city come alive with vibrant murals, live graffiti sessions, and immersive installations. Artists will transform public walls into powerful stories, giving voice to culture, identity, and activism through brush strokes and spray cans.

name: Dhaka International Folk Fest
shortDescription: Sylhet Folk & Baul Night is a spiritual musical gathering celebrating the mystic poetry and rhythms of rural Bengal. Enjoy soulful performances from renowned Baul singers and folk bands in a magical atmosphere under the stars. The event will also feature local food stalls and handmade crafts, offering a true taste of Sylheti culture.

name: Bangladesh International Tech Expo 2024
shortDescription: Startup Pitch Battle 2025 is Bangladesh’s premier startup competition where ten emerging businesses present their ideas to a panel of investors, mentors, and experts. With live pitching rounds, audience voting, and real-time feedback, the event offers startups a chance to secure funding and go from vision to reality.

name: Rajshahi Food & Flavor Festival
shortDescription: The Rajshahi Food & Flavor Festival is a mouthwatering journey through the flavors of Bangladesh. Explore 50+ stalls offering everything from traditional sweets and biryani to regional fusion dishes. The riverside ambiance, food challenges, and live cooking demos make this a can’t-miss event for every food lover.

name: Photography Masterclass with GMB Akash
shortDescription: This exclusive masterclass with world-renowned photographer GMB Akash will take you deep into the art of visual storytelling. Learn how to capture emotion, culture, and contrast through your lens. With practical field tips, portfolio reviews, and real-time critiques, this workshop is ideal for aspiring and intermediate photographers.
